mapper.select: select max(dayId)+1 from inventorygiftreceipt where createTime >= #{today}
mapper.insert: insert into inventorygiftreceipt(dayId, operatorId, createTime, lastModifiedTime, receiptState, clerkName, goodsList, comment) values(#{dayId}, #{operatorId}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{receiptState}, #{clerkName}, #{goodsList, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler}, #{comment})
mapper.update: update inventorygiftreceipt set lastModifiedTime=#{lastModifiedTime}, receiptState=#{receiptState}, clerkName=#{clerkName}, goodsList=#{goodsList, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler}, comment=#{comment} where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.delete: delete from inventorygiftreceipt where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.select: select * from inventorygiftreceipt where createTime >= #{begin} and createTime <= #{end}
